description: Xiao è il Vigilante Yaksha di Liyue, un adepto che combatte i demoni da millenni. Eccelle negli attacchi plunge durante il suo Elemental Burst.
info: Xiao si basa su attacchi plunge durante il Burst. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e Energy Recharge per uptime costante del Burst.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Whirlwind Thrust
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
skills.desc: Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies in his path.
skills.details_html:
Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies in his path. Can be used in mid-air. Starts with 2 charges.

skills.name: Bane of All Evil
skills.desc: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.
skills.details_html:
Bane of All Evil
Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability, increases his attack AoE and attack DMG, and converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.

passive_talents.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
passive_talents.desc: Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
passive_talents.desc: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists. The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

passive_talents.name: Evil Conqueror: Tamer of Demons
passive_talents.desc: Increases all party members' Movement SPD by 10% during Bane of All Evil.

constellations.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.desc: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

constellations.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evil Conqueror: Vigilant Yaksha
constellations.desc: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
